headline: Management Program Analyst at U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE)
summary:
A self-starter, result-driven program manager with proven success leading programs to streamline operations, enhance efficiency, and direct technical initiatives. Excels in building rapport with clients and colleagues, and motivating staff and team members. Comprehensive knowledge and experience within areas of policy development, project leadership, partner collaboration, budgetary analysis and enterprise risk management. Exceptional communication skills and expertise engaging with business partners, targeted audiences, executive management teams and colleagues of all levels. 

Specialties:  strategic planning & forecasting, agile project management, project management, program management, process streamlining, stakeholder engagement, community building and organizing, business development, financial analysis, consulting, staff training, leadership, software development, enterprise architecture, data analytics, data science, system engineering life cycle.

positions.description:

Leads technical staff teams to execute a wide range of services including hosting, solution architecture and technology integration, Java development, content architecture, and data analytics.  Meet with stakeholders, gathered requirements, and crafted requirements documentation
â¢	Manages the NTIS Acquisition department, which is responsible for the procurement and administration of over $20 million worth of equipment and labor services.  Oversees 65 contractual employees and ensured vendor met agencyâs requirements within the statement of work  
â¢	Manages information technology projects valued at over $15M and cross-functional teams of up to 20 developers, programmers, analysts, financial, and network specialists. 
â¢	Led technical team to redesign and successfully deploy www.NTIS.gov for new data centric mission
positions.title: Program Management Office Team Lead

positions.companyName: Department of Commerce - National Technical Information Service
positions.description: Performed budgetary review, monitoring and execution in line with organizational requirements and yearly spending plans. Reviewed and consolidated operating budget estimates to meet business needs. Ensured compliance with all relevant regulations and protocols throughout budgetary analysis processes.
positions.title: Budget Analyst

positions.description: Provided oversight and direction for finance and accounting functions, in part through development of Standards of Procedures manual. Collaborated with Vocational Rehabilitation Counselors and various financial institutions to resolve arising financial issues.
positions.title: Financial Accounts Specialist

positions.description: Reviewed general ledger and accounts payable and accounts receivable, prepared financial reports, and monitored payroll.
positions.title: Accountant
